netarhat.description: Known as the Queen of Chotanagpur, famous for sunrise/sunset, forests, and waterfalls.
netarhat.activities: Sunrise at Magnolia Point, trekking, and visiting waterfalls nearby.

patratu.description: Patratu Valley is scenic with winding roads, lake views, and hills.
patratu.activities: Road trip, boating in Patratu Lake, enjoying valley views.

betla.description: Betla National Park is known for tigers, elephants, and rich biodiversity.
betla.activities: Wildlife safari, exploring waterfalls and forts inside the park.

hundru.description: Hundru Falls is a 98m waterfall, spectacular during monsoon and winter.
hundru.activities: Photography, picnics, and trekking near the falls.

deoghar.description: Deoghar is a pilgrimage city, home to Baba Baidyanath Jyotirlinga temple.
deoghar.best_time: July (Shravan month pilgrimage), October to March for tourism.
deoghar.activities: Temple visit, ropeway to Trikuta Hills, shopping for pedas (local sweets).
